titles.title: A concurrent resolution recognizing the 50th anniversary of the Food and Nutrition Service of the Department of Agriculture.
A concurrent resolution recognizing the 50th anniversary of the Food and Nutrition Service of the Department of Agriculture.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition, Oversight, and Department Operations.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution recognizes the valuable historic and continued contributions of the Food and Nutrition Service and its employees to the nutrition, health, and well-being of the people of the United States.
